name: baseChance
description: The base chance for a drop rush to occur.

name: baseChance
description: The base chance for a gold rush to occur.

name: minimumDistanceBetween
description: The minimum distance between fishing spots, preventing them from spawning too close together.

name: spawnDistance
description: The distance fishing spots will spawn from the player.

name: spawnIntervalSeconds
description: The seconds that must pass after a fishing spot appeared before another fishing spot can appear for a player.

name: afterFishingCooldownSeconds
description: The seconds that must pass after fishing a fishing spot before another fishing spot can appear for a player.

name: fishingRangeTolerance
description: The maximum distance a bobber can be from a fishing spot to still trigger it.

name: secondsUntilLured
description: Fishing spots will lure fish quicker than regular water. Set to -1 to disable.

name: totalLimitPerChunk
description: The limit of fishing spots that can spawn in a given chunk overall. Once this many fishing spots have spawned, the chunk will never spawn any again. Set to -1 to disable.

name: projectForwardDistance
description: The offset applied to the spawn area in the direction the player is facing. Set to 0 to center it around the player.

name: minimumDistanceBetween
description: The minimum distance between dig spots, preventing them from spawning too close together.

name: spawnDistance
description: The distance dig spots will spawn from the player.

name: spawnIntervalSeconds
description: The seconds that must pass after a dig spot appeared before another dig spot can appear for a player.

name: afterDiggingCooldownSeconds
description: The seconds that must pass after digging a dig spot before another dig spot can appear for a player.

name: totalLimitPerChunk
description: The limit of dig spots that can spawn in a given chunk overall. Once this many dig spots have spawned, the chunk will never spawn any again. Set to -1 to disable.

name: projectForwardDistance
description: The offset applied to the spawn area in the direction the player is facing. Set to 0 to center it around the player.
